modName: Teutonic Templar and Knights of the Nine Crusader Warhorse
summary: adds a Armored Warhorse in a Teutonic Knight, Templar or Knight of the Nine(whatever texture you choose) Style to the entrance of Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
if you occure the \"weird pixelated\" problem this is sometimes caused by convert junk leftover whatever- you can fix that with reconverting it yourself from dds. to dds. until i finally got my converting programm fixed. 

or try to increase your Texture Quality in Skyrim options.



[size=+1][color=blue]adds a Armored Warhorse in a Teutonic Knight, Templar or Knight of the Nine(whatever texture you choose) Style to the entrance of Riverwood.[/color]

you can have only one of the  at a time one file replaces the other

bigger, tougher and faster then a normal Horse.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Thanks to mystikhybrid for letting us use his great Horse Armor meshes![/size]


thanks to Shivvlan for finding out how to fix that.


if you cant find him try open Console and type: help Kolberg

there you\'ll get his ID.

then type: player.placeatme \"the id you got\"
author: KnelTotenschwur
